commit message: Avoid multiple queries to the activity preference database at startup.

Added overflow menu to the action bar, code cleanup
Fix compatibility with some devices (app was broken on Gingerbread)
Updated screenshots, correct Material Status Bar Color @ API21+

Improved threading logic, fixed thread leaking.
Major changes in the thread management logic. Now using multiple threads to take advantage of multicore CPUs.
